name: Shoulder Shrug
how_to_perform:
1. Hold your arms by your sides with your palms facing the ground.
2. Without moving your upper arms, lift your shoulders forward and up towards your ears.
3. Pause briefly at the top of the movement, squeezing your shoulder muscles.
4. Slowly return to the starting position without moving your upper arms.
short_summary: A simple exercise where you shrug your shoulders up and down to work multiple muscle groups.
